local_intent: Perceive white_plate, move to it, perform approach-and-align, pick using existing grasp, then verify grasp success
assumptions: ComputeGraspPose has previously populated blackboard key 'white_plate_grasp'
Gripper is open and ready to pick
Perception may require a short scan if object not initially visible
coherence_with_global: Implements the LOCAL_ANNOTATION active leaf (ApproachAndAlign) within the global plan: perceptual fallback -> detect -> move -> approach/align -> pick -> verify, using timeouts and parameters consistent with the GLOBAL_BT semantics.
